---
description: A DOM mounter for React previews.
---

A component used for mounting React component to the DOM for preview purposes.
This basic mounter inlcudes an overlay for errors in dev mode and nice error messages in scope preview mode.

### Component usage

Use this snippet in the mounter.(js|ts) file of your env and

```tsx
import { createMounter } from '@teambit/react.mounter';

export default createMounter(({ children }) => {
  // use to wrap your components with providers. e.g. graphql, themes or routing.
  return <>{children}<>;
});
```
